title.narrative: Metta HIV & AIDS Positive Living Centres

description.narrative: * 80% PLHAs in project areas receive social and peer support * 50% increase in HIV testing from amongst vulnerable groups * 80% community reached with HIV education and information * 80% PLHAs and their sexual partners report regular use of condoms * 50% PLHA families received social support * 50% PLHAs get support to enhance their livelihood and economic needs. * Increased community participation leading to reduction of stigma and discrimination in the community * Increase utilization of evidence based and local needs-based planning and implementation programs in the field. * 40% PLHAs enhanced their capacity to facilitate and lead community led programs * 75% increase in accessing health services such as STI, TB, hepatitis, ART etc * Increase in awareness about healthy living amongst PLHAs and their families * Reduction in risky behaviors amongst PLHAs

GOAL: People Living with HIV/AIDS mobilized and empowered to take the lead in HIV Prevention and Care in Mogaung & Wai Maw (OSI) Township. Objectives: 1. Develop a drop-in service centre called Positive Living center that creates an enabling environment for people to build a sense of 'community' based on shared responsibility and solidarity 2. Increase the involvement of PLHAs in the provisions of social and health services through facilitating the formation of peer groups in communities (GIPA) 3. Enhance their participation in community HIV prevention programmes through leading awareness campaigns disseminating proper and accurate knowledge of HIV/AIDS, TB, drug abuse and related issues. 4. Reduce social stigma, exclusion and isolation of PLHAs while increasing their Capacity to take control and have ownership of their future through collective social mobilization and focused advocacy. The project will achieve these objectives by applying a participatory approach that will facilitate a process of enabling PLHAs to gain new knowledge, reclaim their dignity, and improve collective well-being by promoting healthy behaviours, positive and productive lifestyles and greater responsibility towards the larger communit
